A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is a masterpiece! The only way star wars can carry on with new content is with new shocking stories... People are too stuck in their bubble to notice a fantastic Star Wars film when they see it. There are flaws but Empire had flaws too. Disney knew they needed to make original content but there needed to be a switch up in order for ORIGINAL stories to be told and that is exactly what happens in 'The Last Jedi'. It's a funny\, shocking\, emotional\, action packed journey that leads the way to what I can only see as an explosive Episode 9.  Kyle Ren and Luke Skywalker are the stand out performers. I can't wait to see this again!
